backend/main.mo: Actor implementing metadata, user profiles, and vendor profile management with permission checks and CRUD operations.
backend/migration.mo: Defines migration types and returns old actor state unchanged for upgrade compatibility.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries of various frontend source files for reference.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base styles defining OKLCH color variables and light/dark theme tokens.
frontend/index.html: Base HTML document loading the React app entry script.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Sets up TanStack Router with public, admin, and vendor routes wrapped in auth and role requirements.
frontend/src/components/auth/AuthControl: Login/logout UI using Internet Identity with principal display and role reset on logout.
frontend/src/components/auth/RequireAuth: Auth guard displaying loading, sign-in prompt, or protected content based on identity state.
frontend/src/components/auth/RequireRole: Ensures an authenticated user has selected admin or vendor mode, redirecting otherwise.
frontend/src/components/layout/AppLayout: App layout wrapper with header, main content area, and footer including Caffeine attribution.
frontend/src/components/layout/HeaderNav: Responsive header navigation showing links based on authentication and role mode, including admin and vendor sections.
frontend/src/components/status/Connectio: Displays backend connection, environment info, and authentication status with loading and error handling.
frontend/src/components/vendor/VendorPro: Form for creating or editing vendor products with validation, category and currency options, and backend mutation handling.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Initializes and caches an authenticated or anonymous backend actor, refreshing dependent queries on identity change.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity authentication state, login/logout handling, and persistence via an auth client.
frontend/src/hooks/useMarketplaceQueries: React Query hooks for fetching and mutating marketplace data including products, vendors, and profiles using the backend actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: React Query hooks for backend status, ping checks, and identity lookup using the current actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useRoleMode.ts: LocalStorage‑backed hook for storing and managing the current admin or vendor role mode.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind layers and extensive CSS variables for light and dark themes, applying global background, text, and border styles.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app, wrapping it with React Query and Internet Identity providers before rendering App.
Displays an admin dashboard for viewing and verifying vendor profiles with loading, error, and empty states.
frontend/src/pages/LandingPage.tsx: Provides a marketing-style landing page with feature highlights and navigation to products and role selection.
frontend/src/pages/ProductDetailPage.tsx: Loads and displays detailed product information with pricing, image, and vendor data, handling loading and error states.
frontend/src/pages/PublicProductsPage.ts: Shows a searchable, filterable list of published products with category selection and navigation to detail pages.
frontend/src/pages/RoleSelectPage.tsx: Lets authenticated users choose between admin or vendor roles, navigating accordingly and describing each role’s capabilities.
frontend/src/pages/VendorLayoutPage.tsx: Renders the vendor dashboard layout with tabs for profile and products, highlighting the active route and wrapping child content.
frontend/src/pages/VendorPlaceholderPage: Empty placeholder page with no implementation.
frontend/src/pages/VendorProductsPage.ts: Displays the vendor’s product list with loading and error states, and supports creating and editing products via dialogs.
frontend/src/pages/VendorProfilePage.tsx: Allows vendors to view and edit their profile information, handling loading, success, and error states.
Lists all verified vendors with loading and error states and links to individual vendor storefronts.
Shows a public vendor storefront with profile details and product listings, including loading and error handling.
frontend/src/types/marketplace.ts: Empty file with no defined marketplace types.
frontend/src/utils/placeholders.ts: Exports static placeholder image paths for product and vendor logo assets.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for reading, persisting, and clearing URL and session parameters, including hash‑based parsing.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration enabling dark mode, custom OKLCH-based theme colors, typography, container queries, and animation utilities.
project_state.json: Project metadata describing current phase progression, architecture notes, known issues, and a list of existing scoped features for the multi-vendor marketplace.
